title: Two blades of grass
creator_credit: S.T. Evans and CSIRO. Film Unit
brief_description: Develops the theme that Australia’s agricultural future could depend on the use of a properly fertilised legume. The role of the legume nodule in this respect and in opening up new areas is stressed.
description: Develops the theme that Australia’s agricultural future could depend on the use of a properly fertilised legume. The role of the legume nodule in this respect and in opening up new areas is stressed.
